pageTitle: AI Music Generator - Create Songs with AI
pageDescription: Generate professional quality music with vocals using AI. Create songs up to 5 minutes with lyrics, choose from various styles and moods. Professional mastering available.
heading: AI Music Generator
subheading: Create professional songs with AI-generated vocals and instrumentals

generator.title: Create New Song
generator.promptPlaceholder: A catchy pop song about summer love with upbeat melody and female vocals...
generator.lyricsPlaceholder:
[Verse 1]
Write your lyrics here...

[Chorus]
The chorus goes here...

[Verse 2]
Second verse...
generator.lyricsHint: Use [Verse], [Chorus], [Bridge], [Outro] tags to structure your song

pleaseWait: This may take a few minutes. AI is composing your music.

mastering.title: Professional Mastering
mastering.description: Enhance your track with AI-powered professional mastering
mastering.hiDesc: Maximum loudness and punch, great for EDM/Rock

library.title: My Music Library
library.deleteFolderConfirm: Are you sure? Songs in this folder will be moved to "All Songs".
library.emptyLibraryHint: Generate your first song to see it here

actions.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this song?

errors.promptRequired: Please describe what kind of song you want to create
errors.promptTooShort: Please provide a more detailed description
errors.insufficientCredits: Not enough credits. Please purchase more credits.
errors.generationFailed: Song generation failed. Please try again.
errors.timeout: Generation timed out. Please try again.
errors.folderExists: A folder with this name already exists

vocals.title: AI Vocals
vocals.description: Generate realistic vocals with lyrics in any style. Male, female, or custom voices.

duration.title: Up to 5 Minutes
duration.description: Create full-length songs up to 5 minutes. Perfect for complete tracks with verses and choruses.

mastering.title: Professional Mastering
mastering.description: Enhance your tracks with AI-powered mastering. Three intensity levels for perfect sound.

styles.title: Multiple Styles
styles.description: Choose from pop, rock, electronic, jazz, classical and many more musical styles.
